title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\AcceleratorConfig
name: AcceleratorConfig
description:
Specifies the type and number of accelerator cards attached to the instances of an instance group (see GPUs on Compute Engine).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.AcceleratorConfig

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getAcceleratorTypeUri
methods.description:
Full URL, partial URI, or short name of the accelerator type resource to expose to this instance. See Google Compute Engine AcceleratorTypes Examples

  • https://www.googleapis.com/compute/beta/projects/[project_id]/zones/us-east1-a/acceleratorTypes/nvidia-tesla-k80
  • projects/[project_id]/zones/us-east1-a/acceleratorTypes/nvidia-tesla-k80
  • nvidia-tesla-k80

Generated from protobuf field string accelerator_type_uri = 1;
